messages.subject: Stolen sword
messages.msgSnippet: All, a friend in California has had her sword stolen. I have placed a description and the few images she has of the sword within under following link. If
messages.messageBody:
All, a friend in California has had her sword stolen. I have placed a
description and the few images she has of the sword within under
following link. If anyone knows of this sword, or has seen it, please do
not hesitate to contact me

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/personal/Lee/Stolen_Sword.htm

Cheers
--

Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board
<http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>
- /for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
